1. Install elasticseach
3. copy the installed elastic search folder in bot> smart-bot>elastisearch
2. copy the node folder from elasticsearch node folder
3. go in the bot> smart-bot>elastisearch
4. go in elasticsearch-7.5.0
5. go in data folder and paste the node folder here
6. now go in  bot> smart-bot>
7. open commond prompt run these commands (make sure you have node installed)
	a. npm install
	b. npm start
